Text: Ok i'll stop making torrents ,i have problem with trackers! and with upload --the pirate bay don't accept my torrents i'dont now why!!! torrents +50mb his not uploading ...error ...and i'dont now how too fix'it!!!

You need to put your files into .zip or .rar archives. 

It is the only way to upload a large number of files.

If you have too many files in your torrent TBP will not accept it.
